mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member, (SELECT you_no AS fri, res_date FROM friend WHERE i_no = #{member_no} AND res_date IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT i_no AS fri, res_date FROM friend WHERE you_no = #{member_no} and res_date IS NOT NULL) AS a WHERE member_no = a.fri ORDER BY nickname ASC
SELECT channel_no from chat_channel where title = '${i_no}_${member_no}' OR title = '${member_no}_${i_no}'

SELECT friend_no,channel_no, type, title, ch.limit, (SELECT nickname FROM member WHERE friend_no = member_no) nickname, (SELECT content FROM chat_history his WHERE his.channel_no = ch.channel_no ORDER BY his.regdate DESC limit 1) msg, (SELECT regdate FROM chat_history his WHERE his.channel_no = ch.channel_no ORDER BY his.regdate DESC limit 1) msg_regdate FROM chat_channel ch RIGHT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT *, (case when i_no = ${i_no} then you_no when you_no = ${i_no} then i_no END) friend_no FROM friend WHERE ${i_no} = I_no AND res_date is not null OR ${i_no} = you_no AND res_date is not null ) AS a ON title = concat(${i_no},'_',friend_no) or title = concat(friend_no,'_',${i_no}) ORDER BY msg_regdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_history (channel_no, member_no, content, regdate, isread) VALUES (#{channel_no}, #{member_no}, #{content}, now(), #{isread})

INSERT INTO chat_channel (type, title, chat_channel.limit, regdate) VALUES (0, concat('${member_no}','_', '${friend_no}'), 2, now())
SELECT channel_no FROM chat_channel WHERE title = concat('${member_no}','_', '${friend_no}')
mapper.select: SELECT channel_no FROM chat_channel WHERE title = concat('${member_no}','_','${friend_no}') or title = concat('${friend_no}', '_' ,'${member_no}')
mapper.insert: insert INTO chat_member (channel_no, member_no, joindate) VALUES (#{channel_no}, #{member_no}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_channel ch left join ( SELECT channel_no, count(*) num_enter, exitdate FROM chat_member GROUP BY channel_no, exitdate HAVING exitdate IS NULL) m ON m.channel_no = ch.channel_no WHERE type=1 AND closedate IS NULL ORDER BY regdate DESC

SELECT *, (SELECT content FROM chat_history his WHERE his.channel_no = chn.channel_no ORDER BY his.regdate DESC limit 1) msg, (SELECT his.regdate FROM chat_history his WHERE his.channel_no = chn.channel_no ORDER BY his.regdate DESC limit 1) msg_regdate, (SELECT count(*) FROM chat_member where channel_no = chn.channel_no GROUP BY channel_no, isexited ) num_enter FROM chat_channel cha inner join ( SELECT *, (SELECT ch.type FROM chat_channel ch WHERE m.channel_no = ch.channel_no) type FROM chat_member m WHERE member_no = #{member_no}) chn ON cha.channel_no = chn.channel_no WHERE chn.type = 1 AND cha.closedate IS null AND isexited = 0 ORDER BY msg_regdate DESC
